author: cnbc.com
title: PRA Group Opens New Call Center in Henderson, Nevada
text:
NORFOLK, Va., Feb. 12, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- PRA Group , Inc. (Nasdaq:PRAA), a global leader in acquiring and collecting nonperforming loans, today announced the start of operations at its new call center in Henderson, Nevada.
Henderson Mayor Debra March, who attended a ribbon-cutting ceremony on Jan. 6 at the new site, said, “I’m pleased to welcome PRA Group to Henderson and look forward to the contribution the company will make to our local business community as a global leader in their industry. Attracting high-caliber businesses to Henderson contributes to the health of our economy and provides vital new employment opportunities for our residents.”
Kevin Stevenson, president and chief executive officer of PRA Group, said, “We are excited to open this new call center to accommodate the increased supply we are seeing, and we look forward to long-term growth and success in Henderson.”
Last year, the Company commissioned a site selection study that utilized success factors related to its existing locations to identify alternative markets with the best combination of talent, cost, and competitive conditions in the U.S.
About PRA Group
As a global leader in acquiring and collecting nonperforming loans, PRA Group returns capital to banks and other creditors to help expand financial services for consumers in the Americas and Europe. With more than 4,500 employees worldwide, PRA Group companies collaborate with customers to help them resolve their debt. For more information, please visit www.pragroup.com .
